verses.verse: Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about when Adoni-zedek king <S%H4428><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> that Joshua <S%H3091><s%> had captured <S%H3920><s%> Ai, <S%H5857><s%> and had utterly <S%H2763><s%> destroyed <S%H2763><s%> it (just <S%H9201><s%> as he had done <S%H6213><s%> to Jericho <S%H3405><s%> and its king, <S%H4428><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> he had done <S%H6213><s%> to Ai <S%H5857><s%> and its king <S%H4428><s%>), and that the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Gibeon <S%H1391><s%> had made <S%H7999><s%> peace <S%H7999><s%> with Israel <S%H3478><s%> and were within <S%H7130><s%> their land, <S%H7130><s%>

that he feared <S%H3372><s%> greatly, <S%H3966><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> Gibeon <S%H1391><s%> [was] a great <S%H1419><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> like one <S%H259><s%> of the royal <S%H4467><s%> cities, <S%H5892><s%> and because <S%H3588><s%> it was greater <S%H1419><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> Ai, <S%H5857><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> its men <S%H376><s%> [were] mighty. <S%H1368><s%>

Therefore Adoni-zedek king <S%H4428><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> [word] to Hoham <S%H1944><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Hebron <S%H2275><s%> and to Piram <S%H6502><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Jarmuth <S%H3412><s%> and to Japhia <S%H3309><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Lachish <S%H3923><s%> and to Debir <S%H1688><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Eglon, <S%H5700><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Come <S%H5927><s%> up to me and help <S%H5826><s%> me, and let us attack <S%H5221><s%> Gibeon, <S%H1391><s%> for it has made <S%H7999><s%> peace <S%H7999><s%> with Joshua <S%H3091><s%> and with the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>"

So the five <S%H2568><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Hebron, <S%H2275><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Jarmuth, <S%H3412><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Lachish, <S%H3923><s%> [and] the king <S%H4428><s%> of Eglon, <S%H5700><s%> gathered <S%H622><s%> together and went <S%H5927><s%> up, they with all <S%H3605><s%> their armies, <S%H4264><s%> and camped <S%H2583><s%> by Gibeon <S%H1391><s%> and fought <S%H3898><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> it.

Then the men <S%H376><s%> of Gibeon <S%H1391><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> [word] to Joshua <S%H3091><s%> to the camp <S%H4264><s%> at Gilgal, <S%H1537><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Do not abandon <S%H7503><s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H4480><s%> your servants; <S%H5650><s%> come <S%H5927><s%> up to us quickly <S%H4120><s%> and save <S%H3467><s%> us and help <S%H5826><s%> us, for all <S%H3605><s%> the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%> that live <S%H3427><s%> in the hill <S%H2022><s%> country <S%H2022><s%> have assembled <S%H6908><s%> against <S%H413><s%> us."

So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up from Gilgal, <S%H1537><s%> he and all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> with him and all <S%H3605><s%> the valiant <S%H2428><s%> warriors. <S%H1368><s%>

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> "Do not fear <S%H3372><s%> them, for I have given <S%H5414><s%> them into your hands; <S%H3027><s%> not one <S%H376><s%> of them shall stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you."
So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> came <S%H935><s%> upon them suddenly <S%H6597><s%> by marching <S%H5927><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> night <S%H3915><s%> from Gilgal. <S%H1537><s%>

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> confounded <S%H2000><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and He slew <S%H5221><s%> them with a great <S%H1419><s%> slaughter <S%H4347><s%> at Gibeon, <S%H1391><s%> and pursued <S%H7291><s%> them by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the ascent <S%H4608><s%> of Beth-horon, and struck <S%H5221><s%> them as far <S%H5704><s%> as Azekah <S%H5825><s%> and Makkedah. <S%H4719><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about as they fled <S%H5127><s%> from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> [while] they were at the descent <S%H4174><s%> of Beth-horon, that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> threw <S%H7993><s%> large <S%H1419><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%> on them as far <S%H5704><s%> as Azekah, <S%H5825><s%> and they died; <S%H4191><s%> [there were] more <S%H7227><s%> who <S%H834><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> from the hailstones <S%H1259><s%> <S%H68><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> those whom <S%H834><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> killed <S%H2026><s%> with the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> when the Lord <S%H3068><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> up the Amorites <S%H567><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and he said <S%H559><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> "O sun, <S%H8121><s%> stand <S%H1826><s%> still <S%H1826><s%> at Gibeon, <S%H1391><s%> And O moon <S%H3394><s%> in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Aijalon. <S%H357><s%>"

So the sun <S%H8121><s%> stood <S%H1826><s%> still, <S%H1826><s%> and the moon <S%H3394><s%> stopped, <S%H5975><s%> Until <S%H5704><s%> the nation <S%H1471><s%> avenged <S%H5358><s%> themselves of their enemies. <S%H340><s%> Is it not written <S%H3789><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of Jashar <S%H3477><s%>? And the sun <S%H8121><s%> stopped <S%H5975><s%> in the middle <S%H2677><s%> of the sky, <S%H8064><s%> and did not hasten <S%H213><s%> to go <S%H935><s%> [down] for about a whole <S%H8549><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

And there was no <S%H3808><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> like that before <S%H6440><s%> it or after <S%H310><s%> it, when the Lord <S%H3068><s%> listened <S%H8085><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of a man; <S%H376><s%> for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> fought <S%H3898><s%> for Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
Then Joshua <S%H3091><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> with him returned <S%H7725><s%> to the camp <S%H4264><s%> to Gilgal. <S%H1537><s%>
Now these <S%H428><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> had fled <S%H5127><s%> and hidden <S%H2244><s%> themselves in the cave <S%H4631><s%> at Makkedah. <S%H4719><s%>

And it was told <S%H5046><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "The five <S%H2568><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> have been found <S%H4672><s%> hidden <S%H2244><s%> in the cave <S%H4631><s%> at Makkedah. <S%H4719><s%>"

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Roll <S%H1556><s%> large <S%H1419><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> against <S%H413><s%> the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the cave, <S%H4631><s%> and assign <S%H6485><s%> men <S%H376><s%> by it to guard <S%H8104><s%> them,

but do not stay <S%H5975><s%> [there] yourselves; <S%H9043><s%> pursue <S%H7291><s%> your enemies <S%H340><s%> and attack <S%H2179><s%> them in the rear. <S%H2179><s%> Do not allow <S%H5414><s%> them to enter <S%H935><s%> their cities, <S%H5892><s%> for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into your hand. <S%H3027><s%> "

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about when Joshua <S%H3091><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> had finished <S%H3615><s%> slaying <S%H5221><s%> them with a very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> slaughter, <S%H4347><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> they were destroyed, <S%H8552><s%> and the survivors <S%H8300><s%> [who] remained <S%H8277><s%> of them had entered <S%H935><s%> the fortified <S%H4013><s%> cities, <S%H5892><s%>

that all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to the camp <S%H4264><s%> to Joshua <S%H3091><s%> at Makkedah <S%H4719><s%> in peace. <S%H7965><s%> No <S%H3808><s%> one uttered <S%H2782><s%> a word <S%H3956><s%> against any of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Then Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Open <S%H6605><s%> the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the cave <S%H4631><s%> and bring <S%H3318><s%> these <S%H428><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> out to me from the cave. <S%H4631><s%>"

And they did <S%H6213><s%> so, <S%H3651><s%> and brought <S%H3318><s%> these <S%H428><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> out to him from the cave: <S%H4631><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Hebron, <S%H2275><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Jarmuth, <S%H3412><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Lachish, <S%H3923><s%> [and] the king <S%H4428><s%> of Eglon. <S%H5700><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about when they brought <S%H3318><s%> these <S%H428><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> out to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> that Joshua <S%H3091><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to the chiefs <S%H7101><s%> of the men <S%H376><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> who had gone <S%H1980><s%> with him, "Come <S%H7126><s%> near, <S%H7126><s%> put <S%H7760><s%> your feet <S%H7272><s%> on the necks <S%H6677><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> kings. <S%H4428><s%>" So they came <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> their feet <S%H7272><s%> on their necks. <S%H6677><s%>

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> then said <S%H559><s%> to them, "Do not fear <S%H3372><s%> or be dismayed! <S%H2865><s%> Be strong <S%H2388><s%> and courageous, <S%H553><s%> for thus <S%H3602><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will do <S%H6213><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> your enemies <S%H340><s%> with whom <S%H834><s%> you fight. <S%H3898><s%>"

So afterward <S%H310><s%> <S%H3651><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> struck <S%H5221><s%> them and put <S%H4191><s%> them to death, <S%H4191><s%> and he hanged <S%H8518><s%> them on five <S%H2568><s%> trees; <S%H6086><s%> and they hung <S%H8518><s%> on the trees <S%H6086><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> evening. <S%H6153><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about at sunset <S%H8121><s%> <S%H935><s%> that Joshua <S%H3091><s%> commanded, <S%H6680><s%> and they took <S%H3381><s%> them down <S%H3381><s%> from the trees <S%H6086><s%> and threw <S%H7993><s%> them into the cave <S%H4631><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> they had hidden <S%H2244><s%> themselves, and put <S%H7760><s%> large <S%H1419><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the cave, <S%H4631><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> very <S%H6106><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

Now Joshua <S%H3091><s%> captured <S%H3920><s%> Makkedah <S%H4719><s%> on that day, <S%H3117><s%> and struck <S%H5221><s%> it and its king <S%H4428><s%> with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword; <S%H2719><s%> he utterly <S%H2763><s%> destroyed <S%H2763><s%> it and every <S%H3605><s%> person <S%H5315><s%> who <S%H834><s%> was in it. He left <S%H7604><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> survivor. <S%H8300><s%> Thus he did <S%H6213><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Makkedah <S%H4719><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as he had done <S%H6213><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Jericho. <S%H3405><s%>

Then Joshua <S%H3091><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> with him passed <S%H5674><s%> on from Makkedah <S%H4719><s%> to Libnah, <S%H3841><s%> and fought <S%H3898><s%> against <S%H5973><s%> Libnah. <S%H3841><s%>

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> it also <S%H1571><s%> with its king <S%H4428><s%> into the hands <S%H3027><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and he struck <S%H5221><s%> it and every <S%H3605><s%> person <S%H5315><s%> who <S%H834><s%> [was] in it with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword. <S%H2719><s%> He left <S%H7604><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> survivor <S%H8300><s%> in it. Thus he did <S%H6213><s%> to its king <S%H4428><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as he had done <S%H6213><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Jericho. <S%H3405><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> with him passed <S%H5674><s%> on from Libnah <S%H3841><s%> to Lachish, <S%H3923><s%> and they camped <S%H2583><s%> by it and fought <S%H3898><s%> against it.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> Lachish <S%H3923><s%> into the hands <S%H3027><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and he captured <S%H3920><s%> it on the second <S%H8145><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> and struck <S%H5221><s%> it and every <S%H3605><s%> person <S%H5315><s%> who <S%H834><s%> [was] in it with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword, <S%H2719><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that he had done <S%H6213><s%> to Libnah. <S%H3841><s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> Horam <S%H2036><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Gezer <S%H1507><s%> came <S%H5927><s%> up to help <S%H5826><s%> Lachish, <S%H3923><s%> and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> defeated <S%H5221><s%> him and his people <S%H5971><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> he had left <S%H7604><s%> him no <S%H1115><s%> survivor. <S%H8300><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> with him passed <S%H5674><s%> on from Lachish <S%H3923><s%> to Eglon, <S%H5700><s%> and they camped <S%H2583><s%> by it and fought <S%H3898><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> it.

And they captured <S%H3920><s%> it on that day <S%H3117><s%> and struck <S%H5221><s%> it with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword; <S%H2719><s%> and he utterly <S%H2763><s%> destroyed <S%H2763><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> person <S%H5315><s%> who <S%H834><s%> [was] in it, according to all <S%H3605><s%> that he had done <S%H6213><s%> to Lachish. <S%H3923><s%>

Then Joshua <S%H3091><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> with him went <S%H5927><s%> up from Eglon <S%H5700><s%> to Hebron, <S%H2275><s%> and they fought <S%H3898><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> it.

And they captured <S%H3920><s%> it and struck <S%H5221><s%> it and its king <S%H4428><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> its cities <S%H5892><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the persons <S%H5315><s%> who <S%H834><s%> [were] in it with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword. <S%H2719><s%> He left <S%H7604><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> survivor, <S%H8300><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that he had done <S%H6213><s%> to Eglon. <S%H5700><s%> And he utterly <S%H2763><s%> destroyed <S%H2763><s%> it and every <S%H3605><s%> person <S%H5315><s%> who <S%H834><s%> [was] in it.
Then Joshua <S%H3091><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> with him returned <S%H7725><s%> to Debir, <S%H1688><s%> and they fought <S%H3898><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> it.

And he captured <S%H3920><s%> it and its king <S%H4428><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> its cities, <S%H5892><s%> and they struck <S%H5221><s%> them with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and utterly <S%H2763><s%> destroyed <S%H2763><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> person <S%H5315><s%> [who was] in it. He left <S%H7604><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> survivor. <S%H8300><s%> Just <S%H9201><s%> as he had done <S%H6213><s%> to Hebron, <S%H2275><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> he did <S%H6213><s%> to Debir <S%H1688><s%> and its king, <S%H4428><s%> as he had also done <S%H6213><s%> to Libnah <S%H3841><s%> and its king. <S%H4428><s%>

Thus Joshua <S%H3091><s%> struck <S%H5221><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> the hill <S%H2022><s%> country <S%H2022><s%> and the Negev <S%H5045><s%> and the lowland <S%H8219><s%> and the slopes <S%H794><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> their kings. <S%H4428><s%> He left <S%H7604><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> survivor, <S%H8300><s%> but he utterly <S%H2763><s%> destroyed <S%H2763><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> who <S%H5397><s%> breathed, <S%H5397><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> had commanded. <S%H6680><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> struck <S%H5221><s%> them from Kadesh-barnea even as far <S%H5704><s%> as Gaza, <S%H5804><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the country <S%H776><s%> of Goshen <S%H1657><s%> even as far <S%H5704><s%> as Gibeon. <S%H1391><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> captured <S%H3920><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> and their lands <S%H776><s%> at one <S%H259><s%> time, <S%H6471><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> fought <S%H3898><s%> for Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> with him returned <S%H7725><s%> to the camp <S%H4264><s%> at Gilgal. <S%H1537><s%>
